forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early becoming a steady rain for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly this evening. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. Decreasing clouds with mostly clear skies late. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 44F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
